content: Can someone give this stream a description please
turns out that I can but others can't. But if someone writes one I'll put it in

Question to the Stream: How about: "Allgemeiner, deutschsprachiger Stream für die D-A-CH-Region / General German stream for D-A-CH-region"?
Frage an den Stream: Wie wäre es mit: "Allgemeiner, deutschsprachiger Stream für die D-A-CH-Region / General German stream for D-A-CH-region"?
@Grahame Grieve I think as nobody else is commenting, my suggested description can be taken. Can you add the description. Thanks in advance!
